inclusion.criterion: Pathologically confirmed, recent diagnosis of classical Hodgkin Lymphoma
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: treatment planned with Adriamycin Bleamycin Vinblastine Dacarbazine (ABVD) or Bleomycin Etoposide Adriamycin Cyclophosphamide Vincristine Procarbazine Prednisone regimen (and radiotherapy if applicable)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patient affiliated or beneficiary of a benefit system
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment by ABVD or BEACOPP not indicated
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are pregnant or lactating
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active Hepatitis B or Hepatitis C infection
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN and was diagnosed with Burkitt's lymphoma. However, they have not received treatment for Hodgkin lymphoma and do not meet the criteria for inclusion in this trial.
